dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8963 IH: Home Rule for All Americans Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gohmert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To transfer venue of certain criminal prosecutions of offenses committed in the District of Columbia.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Home Rule for All Americans Act of 2022.

Notwithstanding any other provision of law, in the criminal trial of any individual for the commission of a criminal offense in the District of Columbia, the individual on trial may choose venue for the proceedings and trial to be in the district court for the district and division embracing that individualâ€™s primary residence.
